author: Mary Beltrante
title: Iron Plane Responds to Demand for a 'Seamless' E-Commerce Shopping Experience
text:
Iron Plane , a Portland, Maine-based full service e-commerce and mobile applications developer, has responded to an increasing demand for B2B and B2C e-commerce websites that go far beyond a basic shopping cart, but rather serve as the central hub that link multiple sales channels in one place. This week will see Iron Plane launch its most recent site Jolly Leggings , bringing to 17 the number of sites the company has launched this year, with a further 17 site launches planned by year-end.
Iron Plane specializes in building e-commerce sites for both B2B and B2C clients with specializations in omni-channel; marketplace and multi-vendor; subscription-based sites; and third party integrations.
Built in Magento, Iron Plane sites facilitate communication between client and buyer from the desktop to in-store. With a robust, mobile friendly, e-commerce website, connected to other online sales portals or even to an in-store brick and mortar POS, Iron Plane enables its clients to engage their customers continuously wherever they happen to be shopping.
Iron Plane’s founder, Robert Giovaninni, says: "Customers love the seamless connection between browsing online and then coming into the store to finish the process. With the right combination of marketing automation tools and connected systems, businesses of any size can tailor their content and shopping experience to each customer individually."
Giovaninni added: “Our clients have really stepped up their demand for solutions that are both tailored to their businesses and scalable, and which include the ability to leverage all the new and exciting marketing, analytics and loyalty tools on the market. This makes it an exciting time for Iron Plane too, as we push our limits to meet customer challenges, and in turn design and build even better sites.”

 Eastmans.com Beartoothharley.com Shopbagsy.com Rikiz.com Beddingbyeve.com Barronarden.com Stanleyfurniture.com Loveshawls.com Destination Experience Emckay.com HoponCam Invitebyvoice.com Privai.com Straydogdesigns.com Bambibaby.com Zorrosounds.com Iron Plane has also developed a private label solution so that marketing agencies can offer e-commerce solutions using its development and project management.
###
About Iron Plane
Founded in 2003, Iron Plane creates e-commerce ecosystems that help clients accomplish their digital marketing goals. The company is headquartered in Portland, Maine, with a European satellite office in Poland. Iron Plane’s websites leverage the tools that your team can quickly learn to use to grow your online business.
As a certified partner of SharpSpring , ClipVilla , Evo Payments , Sweet Tooth and Amazon Web Services, Iron Plane offers a complete suite of services for its clients including: marketing/email automation, payment processing, Magento-optimized hosting, and online merchandising tools (product videos and loyalty programs).
